Name: Criminal Girls: Invite Only
About the game: 7 girls have been gathered in the hell spire. These girls, who are called, ' Delinquents ,' are tainted by their criminal DNA. A special rehabilitation was prepared for these girls: the 'Reformation Program.' The goal of this program is to have the girls climb to the highest floor of the spire. If they do, their sins shall be atoned, and they can be revived back into the mortal world. As the program instructor, it is your mission to guide the 7 girls to the very top of the spire. However, these girls are super unique! Will things really go as smoothly as planned?
